hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sarihah said:“My family started to put pressure on me after I came to know the Sunnah. People used to sacrifice one or two sheep, but now our neighbors call us stingy.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ ضَحَّى بِشَاةٍ عَنْ أَهْلِهِ
chapter.eng-name: One who offers a sheep on behalf of his family
